comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: William Howe Sadler, an accomplished photographer, worked in advertising and publishing in Philadelphia, New York, Miami, Cocoa, Hollywood, Tallahassee, and New Orleans. He was Director of the Florida News and Photo Service, Inc. (FN & PS); was Director of the Florida State Advertising Commission; and was a free-lance photographer for Life Magazine. He was an avid fisherman and sportsman. He married Anita Consistre Sadler and had one child, Michael Howe Sadler. (compiled from web sources)

comment._content: Geesh! Is he handling a camera or tossing out depth charges?
